Detailed Description

This is a class that manages and displays the highscore table

void HiScore::show ( u32  iTime  ) 

show the highscore table This function is used to show the highscore table

Parameters:
iTime a new time value to be entered to the list. If this param is 0 the highscore list will just be shown, no entry will be added

int HiScore::update (  ) 

update the screen This function is called every frame and it just returns a value not equal to "0" if a name was entered or the "ESCAPE" key was pressed. In that case the highscore table will not be saved
